defined_text = {
    name = GetPTPlagueActive
	random = no
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_active
        trigger = {
        	has_global_flag = PT_L_time_set
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_passive
    }
}
defined_text = {
    name = GetPTPlagueActiveX
	random = no
    text = {
        localisation_key = plaguetracker.002.oZ
        trigger = {
        	has_global_flag = PT_L_time_set
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = plaguetracker.002.oY
    }
}
### plague strength
defined_text = {
    name = PT_L_loc_str
	random = no
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_doom
        trigger = {
            check_variable = { which = PT_L_strength value = 5 }
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_disastrous
        trigger = {
            check_variable = { which = PT_L_strength value = 4 }
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_virulent
        trigger = {
            check_variable = { which = PT_L_strength value = 3 }
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_moderate
        trigger = {
            check_variable = { which = PT_L_strength value = 2 }
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_weak
        trigger = {
            check_variable = { which = PT_L_strength value = 1 }
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_nonexistent
    }
}

        localisation_key = PT_L_loc_info_1
        trigger = {
            check_variable = { which = PT_L_inc value = 2 }
        }
    }
    text = {
        localisation_key = string_no_plague_info
    }
}
